feed.title: National Olympiad in Informatics
feed.subtitle: The National Olympiad in Informatics is the Sri Lanka’s leading computing competition for the secondary school students. At NOI, contestants have to write programs in C++, Pascal or Java to solve a set of problems within a specified time limit.
